data.author: Axel

changelog.release_notes:
- Pebble2 / Diorite compatibility
- Configuration switch to enable / disable high contrast mode on wrist shake

Pebble Classic / Steel (Aplite):
Fix weekday 
Hide unsupported settings
Allow date format setting (moved up to general settings for all platforms)

New date formats: 31/12/2016 , Sun 31/12
Updated pebble-clay
Smartwatch-Software v3.14 required

data.description:
Deprecated - this app is provided "As Is" and can be used, but there will be no further development or bugfixes.

aText is a simple text watch face with big numbers for good readability. It shows date, a simple battery meter and health data (sleep in the morning, steps after 2000 are reached).

aText features Clay offline configuration for:
- Enable / disable localization (EN, FR, DE, ES, IT, PT)
- Minimum required steps / sleep
- Step goal (watch will vibrate and count will blink on reaching the goal, setting to 0 to turn it off)
- Date format (full ISO or date and weekday)
- Enable / disable high contrast mode on wrist shake
- Text / background color
- Exception color (when required steps / sleep is not reached, or to indicate bluetooth disconnect)

On bluetooth disconnect the watch will vibrate and show a status notification instead of the pebble logo.

Shaking the watch will switch to high contrast / BW mode for 3 seconds to achieve better readability in darker environments.

This app uses the free "Antonio Bold" font, which is licensed under SIL Open Fonts license http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

I created this watchface for my personal use on a Pebble Time, and I'm sharing it in the hope that it might be useful for you, too. Use at your own risk, and if you have any bug reports or suggestions let me know, I'll see what I can do.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Pebble2 / Diorite compatibility
